page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = ui_dlg_eval_valid(C dlg_title ,C expression )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
.T. indicates that the variable exists.
.F. indicates that the variable does not exist.

argument.name: expression
argument.description: An expression that can be interpreted as the name of a variable.

page.description: Tests is an expression is valid in the context of a modeless dialog box
page.discussion: The UI_DLG_EVAL_VALID() function tests for the existence of a variable defined inside another Xdialog. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
